root.message: The DATA_SOURCE field for indicator 15-4-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: NSO SDG focal points will provide reports that include values for both sub-indicators, including the original data and reference sources, and descriptions of how these have been used to derive sub-indicators values. FAO will provide country-specific values for both sub-indicators when national official data do not exist or are incomplete, in consultation with concerned countries

Proveedores de datos

Agencia Espacial Europea

Alianza para las Montañas, FAO

USGS

Поставщики данных

Европейское космическое агентство

Горное партнерство, ФАО

Геологическая служба США
